p: Localized outbreaks of EV-A71 can occur regionally, as was seen in Northern provinces of Chiang Rai and Pha Yao in 2016 where the incidence rates were higher than in other regions [ 97]. Additionally, EV-A71 was the most prevalent genotype found in northern Thailand in which more than 55% of the cases occurred in children below 2â€‰years of age [ 97]. In 2017, the Thai Ministry of Public Health had reported three mortality and an approximate count of 70,000 people who was infected with EVs [ 91]. The relatively rare fatal HFMD may be in part due to small proportion of enterovirus infection associated with EV-A71.
